It’s difficult to notice your passage through wild areas. As long as you’re not in an [urban](/Rules.aspx?ID=617) environment, you’re always considered to be [Covering Tracks](/Actions.aspx?ID=65), even if you chose a different activity in [exploration mode](/Rules.aspx?ID=469).
